Details¶

Abul Kalam
ID: 1811501642

Subpackages¶

details admin.py¶

This program will create visual database pages in Admin panel.

details apps.py¶

This program will create an app in django project.

class details.apps.DetailsConfig(app_name, app_module)¶

Bases: django.apps.config.AppConfig

It is a configuration file of the created ap.

Parameters:AppConfig (string) – It configures the app in django project.
name = 'details'¶

details models.py¶

This program will create database file for Advertise feature.

details urls.py¶

This program will create necessary html hyperlinks to show contents.

details.urls.path(route, view, kwargs=None, name=None, *, Pattern=<class 'django.urls.resolvers.RoutePattern'>)¶

details views.py¶

This program is the controller that fetch data from models.py and send it to the template file.

details.views.view_more(request, pk)¶

This will redirect the url to the view_more page, where a logged in user can see details of a post on which he clicks the link View More.

Parameters:
  • request (HttpResponse) – Takes the request to show view_more.html
  • pk (int) – Gets value of the selected ad’s id through a link
Returns:

returns a request for a html page with form data as dictonary format
Return type:

render request,html page,dictonary
